author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Pic: John Abraham casts his vote at BMC Election 2017

organizations.name: bmc election 2017 the brihanmumbai municipal corporation

text:
The Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation Elections 2017 are underway in Maharashtra today. Many Bollywood stars have turned up to cast their vote and have their voice heard. John Abraham was the latest B-town celeb to reach the Bandra poll booth and cast his vote. The 'Desi Boys' actor had a brief interaction with the media after voting. John urged all his fans to be responsible citizens and exercise their right to elect a deserving candidate. 

The 'Madras Cafe' actor said, "The BMC elections are important as they help in solving ground issues and infrastructure issues. I would request everyone to vote. Make sure you study your candidates properly so that you can determine which candidate is good (sic)" Stressing on the importance of making each vote count, John added, "My entire family has voted."
